channel.title: Protest on SAFA
channel.description: Recent content in Protest on SAFA

item.title: NoBanNoWall SF Protest
item.description:
Hello SAFA! We hope you’re having a good day and are staying updated with he news and active about what’s happening. Just to plug it once again, we are still looking for bakers for the Planned Parenthood bake sale. But, to the point, we are letting you know about a new protests, protesting Trump’s immigration policies that he has enacted. Here are the details:

Where

UN Plaza/Civic Center in San Francisco

When

Saturday February 4th from 3pm-6pm

What

https://www.facebook.com/events/1860032590936254/

Where we will meet

In front of the Asian Art Museum at 3pm

Other

We will have 4-7 signs for you to use. But feel free to bring your own sign if you want to. Although we aren’t keeping track, it would be helpful if you could let us know if you are going or thinking about going.

We hope to see you there!

Thanks, The SAFA Leadership
